group_1.textRight: *Sigh*
So all we're doing is eating, takin' a bath,@and heading off to bed?

group_1.textLeft: Of course not!
It's a sleepover - the fun has just begun!
Just begun...?

group_1.textRight: We're gonna put on our pajamas and talk@'til we conk out.
Just talkin'...?
*Giggle* I'm sure you'll enjoy it, Kyoko,
because we'll be having tea to go with@our conversation.

group_1.textLeft: Yes! One of Mami's special treats!

group_1.textRight: Woah! When did you...?

group_1.textLeft: I made it while they were preparing dinner.
I didn't have much time, so I put together@something simple.

group_1.textRight: I see, that's what you were up to!

group_1.textLeft: Indeed. I'd mentioned it was for after@dinner, hadn't I?

group_1.textRight: Wow...amazing. It sure doesn't look simple...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* I'll prepare us some decaf tea@as an accompaniment.
The jello is so good...!

group_1.textRight: It's quite simple to make. It's merely a matter of@dissolving the base in water and letting it cool.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, you bought that gelatin.
Did the fruit come with it?

group_1.textRight: No, I just added some canned fruit.

group_1.textLeft: Wow... I'll try making it at home sometime.

group_1.textRight: The pound cake is great, too...!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.

group_1.textRight: Is this easy to make as well?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. You just mix the ingredients together@in a bowl, pour it in a mold, and bake.
If you use pancake flour, it's simple.

group_1.textRight: Pancake flour... I'll try that next time.

group_1.textLeft: I'll give you the recipe sometime.

group_1.textRight: Oh, can I have a copy, too?

group_1.textLeft: Of course.

group_1.textRight: Then gimme a call when you make it.
I'll be your taste-tester.

group_1.textLeft: Goodness...you truly are a piece of work.

group_1.textRight: Speaking of which...everything okay with you?
I heard there's a bunch of different groups@duking it out in Kamihama...

group_1.textLeft: There are still many problems at hand,@and I can't say that everything is okay...
But the fighting between the groups@has quelled a bit.

group_1.textRight: I care about everyone's feelings...and I want@them all to be rewarded.
That's why...I want Shizuka and the rest of@the Tokime Clan...
And Yuna and everyone in Promised Blood...
...to all join hands together with us.

group_1.textLeft: Iroha...

group_1.textRight: I know it's selfish of me.
And it's made things difficult for us@in many ways...
...but I can't just give up.

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sorry.
I wish there was some way we could@have helped...

group_1.textRight: No, there's no need to apologize.
All this...is a matter between us Magical Girls@of Kamihama City,
and the Magical Girls who desire to control@the Automatic Purification System.
I can't let you guys get involved in this.
Besides, Madoka, when you guys were in@Kamihama during the Magius incident,
your families were worried sick...
Iroha's got a point.
And besides, ain't it dangerous to leave@Mitakihara City alone these days?

group_1.textLeft: What? Did something happen here, too?

group_1.textRight: Well, there's been this phenomenon where@a bunch of copies of the same Witch show up.

group_1.textLeft: And when it comes to the impact@Mitakihara has had,
there was that time when Witches from@the city's past reappeared in Kamihama.
Oh yes, the one that became like a waking@dream, as though nothing had ever happened...

group_1.textRight: Well, there's a bunch of other stuff we're@dealin' with.

group_1.textLeft: ...I get it. Since there are mirrors that lead@to Mitakihara City as well...
There was another strange thing that happened@when we went to Kamihama back then...

group_1.textRight: You mean that thing where the leaf on@my clothes vanished?

group_1.textLeft: Right...

group_1.textRight: This all stems from the Endless Mirrors,@correct?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...that seems to be the case.
While we know the effects will be negated@if we break the source mirror,
there are still a lot of things we don't@understand...
...I'm still worried.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
